mapper.insert: INSERT INTO img ( ref_table, ref_sn, path, ext, use_yn, created_dt, updated_dt ) VALUES ( #{refTable}, #{refSn}, #{path}, #{ext}, 'Y', NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT img_sn, ref_table, ref_sn, path, ext, use_yn, created_dt, updated_dt FROM img WHERE ref_sn = #{refSn} AND use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE img SET use_yn = 'N', updated_dt = NOW() WHERE img_sn = #{imgSn}
